title: Central Conference of American Rabbis tax revocation

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Central Conference of American Rabbis tax revocation
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

hereby request the following records:
unofficial copies of any documents  filed with the Internal Revenue Service
regarding  05/15/2011 revocation of tax exempt status and documents requesting and granting reinstatement.  Any tax documents filed by them for the years 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023 or 2024 and any documents concerning upcoming or pending revocations.


Central Conference of American Rabbis - AKA CCAR
EIN:  13-1769747  New York Charity Registration Number:  05-99-38
Address: 355 Lexington Ave Floor 8, New York, NY 10017

Exemption Type: 501(c)(3)

Exemption Reinstatement Date: 03-15-2012

Revocation Date: 05-15-2011

Revocation Posting Date: 02-22-2012



The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. There is a public interest in the misclassification of this entity as a church, when in fact that is not accurate.

I request that I be properly classified as a news media requester. I am a writer for the Times of Israel and I am requesting this information in that editorial capacity.
https://blogs.timesofisrael.com/author/julie-guilfoyle/

The Times of Israel is widely recognized for its reporting, publishing regular features on issues of public interest and importance.

In addition, I have covered areas related to this request, and plan to use my editorial skills to analyze and produce original reporting work for my audience.

If you have any questions about my media status, please contact me.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Julie Guilfoyle

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Julie Guilfoyle

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Julie Guilfoyle
